title: The Spaniard's Woman
description: Rhianna spent three years trying to forget Gabriel Ortega, the man she once adored. Gabriel had always considered her his mistress, nothing more and when he decided to marry, she knew she had to leave him - she could never share him with another woman. But Gabriel has never forgotten the woman who once set his nights on fire... When he rediscovers Rhianna again, he is determined to have her in his bed and in his life. But he soon discovers she left Spain with more than just his pride. She also took his son...Now she has no choice but to be the Spaniard's woman.
author: Kat Davidson
